sections.heading: woman; not bound by covenant in joint deed
sections.text: A married woman shall not be bound by any covenant in a joint deed of herself and husband.SourceR.S.1866, c. 43, § 53, p. 291;R.S.1913, § 1566;C.S.1922, § 1515;C.S.1929, § 42-207;R.S.1943, § 42-207.AnnotationsWife joining with husband in conveyance of his p
